text.*:
This is a gallery of flags of South American countries and affiliated international organizations.

Contents

  • 1 International
  • 2 Countries
  • 3 Territories
  • 4 See also

International[edit]

  • Flag of the Organization of American States
  • Flag of the Andean Community of Nations
  • Flag of the Caribbean Community
  • Flag of the European Union, for French Guiana
  • Flag of Mercosur
  • Flag of OPEC
  • Flag of the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie
  • Flag of the Union of South American Nations

  • Flag of Argentina

Territories[edit]

  • Flag of Aruba (Kingdom of the Netherlands)
  • Flag of Bonaire (Kingdom of the Netherlands)
  • Flag of Curaçao (Kingdom of the Netherlands)
  • Flag of the Falkland Islands (British Overseas Territory)
  • The Flag of France is the official flag of French Guiana (Overseas Department of France)
  • Flag of South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands (British Overseas Territory)
